data: StockFormer
StockFormer is a transformer-based model for stock prediction and trading.
Combines temporal attention with self-attention to capture long-term dependencies.
Return: +40.3%, SR: +22.7% SAC
MacMic
MacMic is a hybrid model for macroeconomic forecasting.
Uses HMM for macroeconomic modeling and RL for trading.
US/CN macroeconomic forecasting and trading
IMM
IMM is a hybrid model for macroeconomic and financial forecasting.
Uses a combination of time series and deep learning techniques.
IMM is a hybrid model for macroeconomic and financial forecasting.
EarnHFT
EarnHFT is a high-frequency trading model for stock prediction.
Uses a combination of time series and deep learning techniques.
SOTA in high-frequency trading +30% profit
MacroHFT
MacroHFT is a macroeconomic and financial forecasting model.
Uses a combination of macroeconomic and financial indicators.
Global macroeconomic and financial forecasting and trading
DRPO
Deep Reinforcement Policy Optimization for trading.
Uses deep reinforcement learning for trading.
Average latency of 415ms for trading
CPPI-MADDPG
CPPI-MADDPG is a multi-agent reinforcement learning model for trading.
Uses a combination of CPPI and MADDPG for trading.
SZSE performance: AR: 9.68%, SR: 2.18
HRT
Hybrid Reinforcement Trading for stock prediction and trading.
Uses a combination of PPO and DDPG for trading.
S&P500 performance: Sharpe ratio of 2.18
TRR
TRR is a transformer-based model for stock prediction.
Uses a combination of LLM and reinforcement learning for trading.
Combines transformer-based models with reinforcement learning for trading
